title: Great on hardwood
body: Picks up pet hair well on hardwood; soft roller helps

title: Battery dips
body: Runs ~25 minutes on medium, not 40 as claimed

title: Filter clogs
body: HEPA filter clogs every 2 weeks; suction drops fast

title: Lightweight
body: Super light and easy to carry upstairs

title: No replacement battery
body: Could not find spare battery to buy

title: Carpet struggle
body: Struggles on thick carpet; fine on rugs

title: Wall mount flimsy
body: Wall mount feels flimsy; fell once

title: Handheld handy
body: Handheld mode great for car seats

title: Short bin
body: Dust bin fills fast; needs emptying mid-clean

title: No LED
body: Floor head has no LED light; wish it had one
